title: Gary Busey: Pet Judge
overview: You've got a pet, and it's got problems. There is only one man who can solve them, so good thing you've come to the right place. lt's the honorable Judge Gary Busey and this is his pet court. You're about to meet people with some serious pet problems. They're about to go toe-to-toe with the silver fox of jurisprudence. It's Gary Busey, Pet Judge!
